document_name: SPAN Prodoc - Full signed version - 6 SEP 010.pdf

outputs.output_descr: This project will enhance effective management and sustainable financing of the protected area system in Mongolia . Following outcomes will contribute: 1. Revised policies and legislation to improve management and financing of Mongolia's protected area system 2. Improved capacity to manage and finance Mongolia's protected areas 3. Demonstrated models of improved protected area management and financing in 2 target sites" Orkhon Valley National Park and Ikh Nart Nature Reserve 3. Demonstrated models of improved protected area management and financing in 2 target sites" Orkhon Valley National Park and Ikh Nart Nature Reserve

project_descr: Strengthening of the Protected Area Network in Mongolia (SPAN)
